summary: This mod adds natural looking, beautiful characters which can join you on your adventures. You can also download them as savegames. The companions live in a lodge with full player house functionality.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/21l8nd3.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/118po39.png[/img][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/1Introduction-1.png[/IMG][/center]

[b]Welcome to Beautiful Characters and Companions! What does this mod add?[/b][list]
[*]A series of natural looking, beautiful characters downloadable as level 1 savegame or companions
[*]The Hawk\'s Nest, a Lodge where the companions live & fully functional as player house
[*]All companions are unique in skills, combat style, spells and perks
[*]All companions can be married and their armour customized (they wear custom armour with 0 armour rating)
[*]Full compatibility with fLokii\'s excellent Ultimate Follower Overhaul mod[/list]


[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/1zCharacters.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2w4eb9s.png[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/2NewsandChanges-1.png[/img][/center]

[center][b][color=green][u]Newsflash: Version 2.0 has gone live![/u] Adding four new characters including the Thaeril Twins and finally figured out how to correctly apply make up and export face data. The companions now look 100% like the screenshots.[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Changelog:[/b]

[color=#ADD8E6]Version 2.0[/color][list]
[*]Changed the mod name to \'Beautiful Characters and Companions\'. \'Beautiful\' is a better word to describe the characters.
[*]Added four new characters (Liora Thaeril, Lietta Thaeril, Alessa and Karrel). I really like the twins myself, and they make a good duo with Liora being a \'tank\' and Lietta the ranger.
[*]Added an optional hardcore version. Companions are not set to essential and can be killed.
[*]Properly applied make up, warpaints and facetints. Characters now look 100 % like the screenshots
[*]My mod now includes Veren\'s hairstyle so you don\'t need the replacing mod by Better Males. Thanks Chris57!
[*]Further balancing of perks and stats
[*]Balanced out the voices, the companions now sound different for as much as possible
[*]Again, every companion can be married and they are all compatible with fLokii\'s UFO mod.[/list]

For earlier version changes, see the Changelog section.


[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/9pp89k.png[/img][/center]

[list][*]Your character as a new companion? See above for contest details.
[*]Diaries / background stories about the companions. Don\'t expect too much because I can\'t do voices so dialogue isn\'t really an option.
[*]Post your suggestions![/list]


[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/3requirements-1.png[/IMG][/center]

These mods are HIGHLY recommended. My mod will not work as intented without the following mods:
[list]
[*]ApachiiSkyHair [color=#C35617]by Apachii[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]Download here[/url] [color=orange]Most characters use ApachiiSkyHair hair models.[/color]
[*]Better Males [color=#c35617]by Chris57[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Download here [/url] [color=orange] [b]Download the Younger Faces Merged With Men By Geonox files.[/b] The men look better using those textures.[/color]
[*]Lovely Hairstyles [color=#C35617]by zn00p[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7403]Download here[/url] [color=orange]Siona uses one of these hairstyles, besides that they are indeed lovely and won\'t replace vanilla hairstyles. Win![/color]
[*]Better Females [color=#C35617]by Bella[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Download here[/url] [color=orange]While this is in fact an optional mod I [u]really[/u] recommend this one, it makes the ladies look much more attractive and more like I intended them to be. Using Coverwomen instead will make some of the faces really bleak or cause white lips, while using vanilla textures might make them look too old or something... I designed the faces using Better Females, which I think is an excellent replacer (although a little bit \'glamorous\', I\'d have to agree.)[/color]
[*]Ultimate Follower Overhaul [color=#C35617]by fLokii[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]Download here[/url] [color=orange]fLokii made a mod that\'s just beyond excellence. You [u]need[/u] to download this if you didn\'t already. You\'ll be able to change the gear of my companions without problems, you can ask them to level up their skills with you, and you can have multiple followers (& more). Check out his page.[/color][/list]

These mods are optional, but I still strongly recommend them to have the experience I intented:
[list]
[*]Female Body Mod [color=#C35617]by Caliente[/color] (I\'d go for a slim look) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Download here[/url]
[*]Covereyes [color=#C35617]by mrLenski[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Download here[/url]
[*]Extended Slider Colors [color=#C35617]by Expired[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923]Download here [/url]
[*]Cinematic Lightning ENB [color=#C35617]by HeliosDoubleSix[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142]Download here[/url]
[*]Or instead of Cinematic Lightning: Extreme Graphics Vision ENB [color=#C35617]by Sharpshooter8[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15105]Download here[/url]
[/list]
Used in the screenshots are:[list]
[*]Nachael: Scout Armor [color=#C35617]by doodaboom[/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109] Download here[/url]
[*]Veren: Black Sacrament Armor [color=#C35617]by AmethystDeceiver[/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696] Download here[/url]
[*]Malena: Evening Star [color=#C35617]by FavoredSoul[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10984] Download here[/url]
[*]Malena: LeatherBound Huntress Armour [color=#C35617]by Shadowtroop & DeannaRose 24[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11143]Download here[/url] 
[*]Lush Grass & Trees [color=#C35617]by OpticShooter[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3288]Download here[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3385]here[/url]
[*]Better Standing Animation [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10809]Download here[/url]
[*]Elowin, Elisha, Alrienne: Skimpy Armors by Killer Keos [color=#C35617]by Killer Keos[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654[/url]Download here[/url]
[*]Elisha: Armor Compilation [color=#C35617]by Omegared99[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10277]Download here[/url] 
[*]Nvidia\'s latest driver for SSAO [url=http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx?lang=en-us]Download here[/url]
[*]Photoshop aftertouching (vignette, colour filter, adjusting contrast with ingame levels)[/list]


[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/4installation-1.png[/IMG][/center]

[b]Savegames[/b]: Place the .ess savegames in your \'saves\' folder, found in your skyrim user folder. This is probably located at C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim. If you like to change hairtype, name or colours, use \'showracemenu\' in the developer console. Note that this will reset most of the colours (except for hair). If you notice your haircolour changing you need to make sure that the Extended Colors plugin is near the end (or at the end) of your load order. Also, upon loading you will probably get a message that you\'re missing content. You can ignore this message, it just means I had some plugins activated you don\'t have. Nothing to worry about.

[b]Companions[/b]: [color=99ff33]The latest version of the Mod Manager is compatible with Skyrim\'s new load order system, but you still need to manually make sure that this mod is loaded correctly.[/color] I strongly suggest you use the Nexus Mod Manager to install the companions. If you\'re not using a manager you probably know what you\'re doing... just extract the files into the Skyrim / Data folder. [b][u]Make sure you check BOTH .esm and .esp.[/b][/u] Also, when updating I\'d recommend deleting the old version, resaving your game without the plugin (make sure your precious things are not in the follower\'s inventory or in the Hawk\'s Nest\'s containers) and then activate the new version. Also make sure to place UFO mod at the very end of your load order and my mod just above it. 


[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/5troubleshooting-1.png[/IMG][/center][list]

[*][b]I can\'t train the companions with UFO mod![/b]: I figured out how to make the companions train their stats using UFO. You need to make sure that UFO is the ONLY mod activated that changes things to the follower class (I\'m not talking about appearances or custom follower mods like mine but about mods that increase follower limit, introducte mounts, etc.). You don\'t need any other follower mods because UFO offers all solutions in one (mounts, unlimited follower, tradeable gear, etc). First, save your game with all my followers dismissed. Then activate UFO and make sure it\'s last in load order, right after Beautiful Characters and Companions. Training stats should now work for my followers as well. Please let me know if this works for you guys. If you\'re still having problems, please follow fLokii\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]instructions on how to cleanly install UFO on his own page.[/url]

[*][b]Character X keeps using a bow when the description says he\'s class Y![/b]: Skyrim has this coded to the whole follower thing. I can\'t change that, sorry. Use fLokii\'s UFO mod to remove any unwanted gear.

[*][b]I can\'t find Companion X and Y![/b]: Well I don\'t want to sound harsh, but they\'re all there and not hidden :)

[*][b]X\'s hair is purple![/b]: Shouldn\'t happen. Make sure every file is in the right directory. Again, I recommend using the Mod Manager.

[*][b]My character is bald when I download a savegame![/b]: That\'s because I probably used an older version of Apachii\'s hair mod when the savegame was created. Use [u]showracemenu[/u] in the console to find the correct hairstyle or use one you like better. Sorry for the inconvenience.[/list]



[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/6disclaimers-1.png[/IMG][/center]

No disclaimers for now!


[center][IMG]http://i1076.photobucket.com/albums/w447/PyHarmonic/7thanks-1.png[/IMG][/center][list]

[*][color=#C35617]fLokii[/color] for creating the best Follower Mod that\'s out there. He fixed most problems that I faced with my custom companions. Download and endorse his mod!
[*][color=#C35617]Apachii, Eldiabs and the other modders[/color] listed above
[*][color=#C35617]Chris57[/color] for letting me use his hairstyle (Veren)
[*][color=#C35617]The awesome people on the nexus & bethesda forums[/color] posting tutorials on how to make mods. I\'m not all that great really ;)
[*][color=#C35617]Skyrim Nexus[/color] for hosting an awesome mod community
[*][color=#C35617]Bethesda[/color] for creating their best game yet
[/list]


[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/mrghu.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i39.tinypic.com/9k8c37.png[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=647269][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/rhskev.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/1xz6eb.png[/img][/center]
author: PyHarmonic

files.name: Natural Characters and Companions 1_8 old
files.changelogHtml:
Added the Hawk\'s Nest again
Added Ka\'Zanri, Khajiit Tank
Rebalanced Companion stats
Tweaked Companion uniqueness
Tons of things with the Hawk\'s Nest I can\'t list here, just check for yourselves :)

files.name: Natural Characters and Companions
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the purple hair issues
Added four new characters (Yakov, Gergio, Shelur & Siona)
Characters can now level up to level 81 (using UFO mod)
Adjusted colours and hairstyles of Veren and Nachael according to their races (to popular demand)
Added and removed some spells and perks to balance the companions
Increased functionality of the Cavern with a smelter, anvil, etc
Fixed some floating rocks and stuff
Changed the music in the Hawk\'s Nest to better fit the mood
All companions can be married
Changed armour gear so it won\'t have weird names when using UFO mod.
